title: Flying veterinary service
brief_description: Describes the work of the flying veterinary service established at Broken Hill by the New South Wales Department of Agriculture. Stresses the importance of the service in the national economy. Shows the work of a veterinary officer as he attends to a case of sheep poisoning.
